verbs.description: soon you [V: may] be able to 3d print clothing in your own home as 3d printing becomes more accessible it could change the fashion industry making it easier to recycle and create clothing elizabeth esponnette adidas nike paris amy purdy melissa dawson rio de janeiro iris van herpen danit peleg rochester institute of technology clothing
